timeline.message: Add test for temporary store based spilling

timeline.author: arhimondr
arhimondr
arhimondr
arhimondr

timeline.bodyText:
I don't feel very strong about this, but I would recommend allowing multiple storages, similar as we allow multiple connectors.
Basically instead of having a single file etc/temporary-store.properties we can have a directory, etc/stores. And under that directory we can have multiple configuration files, e.g.: local.properties, hdfs.properties, ...
And then some particular module can be configured to use a specific storage:
e.g.: storage-based-spiller-store=local or storage-based-spiller-store=hdfs.
That would allow different functionality to use different stores. For example spilling could use local store, when Broadcast join in Presto on spark would use hdfs store.
timeline.author: arhimondr

timeline.message:
Fixup! Allow temp storage to have separate conf files and loaded
separately

Introduce temporary store based spilling

Co-authored-by: Andrii Rosa <andriirosa@fb.com>
